   ],
   "source": [
    "r = requests.get(url)\n",
    "json = r.json()\n",
    "json.keys()\n",
    "json[\"Data\"]\n",
    "df = pd.DataFrame(json[\"Data\"]).T\n",
    "#crypto_df1=crypto_df[['CoinName','Algorithm','IsTrading','ProofType','TotalCoinsMined','MaxSupply']]\n",
    "df.tail()"
   ]
  },
  {

   "source": [
    "# Keep only necessary columns:\n",
    "# 'CoinName','Algorithm','IsTrading','ProofType','TotalCoinsMined','TotalCoinSupply'\n",
    "crypto_df=df[['CoinName','Algorithm','IsTrading','ProofType','TotalCoinsMined','MaxSupply']]\n",
    "crypto_df = crypto_df.rename(columns={\"MaxSupply\":\"TotalCoinSupply\"})\n",
    "print(crypto_df.shape)\n",
    "crypto_df.head(20)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 102,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [

     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "(4674, 6)\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# Keep only cryptocurrencies that are trading\n",
    "crypto_df = crypto_df[crypto_df[\"IsTrading\"]==True]\n",
    "print(crypto_df.shape)\n"
   ]
  },

       "<div>\n",

       "    }\n",

       "      <td>EOS</td>\n",
       "      <td>DPoS</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>DPoS</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.02544e+09</td>\n",
       "      <td>-1</td>\n",

       "      <td>BEP2 Token</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>N/A</td>\n",
       "      <td>1000000000</td>\n",

       "    </tr>\n",

       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>PoW</td>\n",

       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "          CoinName   Algorithm IsTrading ProofType TotalCoinsMined  \\\n",
       "42         42 Coin      Scrypt      True   PoW/PoS               0   \n",
       "365        365Coin         X11      True   PoW/PoS               0   \n",

       "611      SixEleven     SHA-256      True       PoW               0   \n",

   "source": [
    "# Keep only cryptocurrencies with a working algorithm\n",
    "#crypto_df= crypto_df.dropna(axis=0,how='any')\n",
    "crypto_df = crypto_df[crypto_df[\"Algorithm\"]!=\"N/A\"]\n",
    "print(crypto_df.shape)\n",
    "\n",
    "crypto_df"
   ]

    "\n",
    "crypto_df = crypto_df[ crypto_df['TotalCoinsMined'] > 0]\n",

     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",

       "    }\n",
       "\n",

       "    }\n",
       "\n",

       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",

       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>CoinName</th>\n",

       "      <td>PoW/PoS</td>\n",
       "      <td>166244</td>\n",
       "      <td>0</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>...</th>\n",
       "      <td>...</td>\n",
       "      <td>...</td>\n",
       "      <td>...</td>\n",
       "      <td>...</td>\n",
       "      <td>...</td>\n",
       "      <td>...</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>ETH</th>\n",
       "      <td>Ethereum</td>\n",
       "      <td>Ethash</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>PoW</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.13899e+08</td>\n",
       "      <td>-1</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>WAVES</th>\n",
       "      <td>Waves</td>\n",
       "      <td>Leased POS</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>LPoS</td>\n",
       "      <td>103873390</td>\n",
       "      <td>-1</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>ADA</th>\n",
       "      <td>Cardano</td>\n",
       "      <td>Ouroboros</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",

       "      <td>45000000000</td>\n",

       "             CoinName   Algorithm IsTrading ProofType TotalCoinsMined  \\\n",
       "NVC          NovaCoin      Scrypt      True   PoW/PoS     3.07931e+06   \n",

       "<div>\n",

    "# Standardize data\n",
    "crypto_scaled = StandardScaler().fit_transform(X)\n",
    "print(crypto_scaled[0:5])"
   ]

   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Reducing Dimensions Using PCA"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 119,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# Use PCA to reduce dimensions to 3 principal components\n",
    "pca = PCA(n_components=3)\n",
    "crypto_pca = pca.fit_transform(crypto_scaled)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 120,

   "source": [
    "# Create a DataFrame with the principal components data\n",
    "pcs_df= pd.DataFrame(\n",
    "    data=crypto_pca, columns=[\"principal component 1\", \"principal component 2\", \"principal component 3\"],index= \n",
    "    y.index\n",
    ")\n",
    "pcs_df"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Clustering Crytocurrencies Using K-Means\n",
    "\n",
    "#### Find the Best Value for `k` Using the Elbow Curve"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 121,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "\n",
       "<div id=\"altair-viz-94bb92ae4583422e91e5e79062ad2988\"></div>\n",
       "<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n",
       "  (function(spec, embedOpt){\n",
       "    let outputDiv = document.currentScript.previousElementSibling;\n",
       "    if (outputDiv.id !== \"altair-viz-94bb92ae4583422e91e5e79062ad2988\") {\n",
       "      outputDiv = document.getElementById(\"altair-viz-94bb92ae4583422e91e5e79062ad2988\");\n",
       "    }\n",
       "    const paths = {\n",
       "      \"vega\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega@5?noext\",\n",
       "      \"vega-lib\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-lib?noext\",\n",
       "      \"vega-lite\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-lite@4.8.1?noext\",\n",
       "      \"vega-embed\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-embed@6?noext\",\n",
       "    };\n",
       "\n",
       "    function loadScript(lib) {\n",
       "      return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {\n",
       "        var s = document.createElement('script');\n",
       "        s.src = paths[lib];\n",
       "        s.async = true;\n",
       "        s.onload = () => resolve(paths[lib]);\n",
       "        s.onerror = () => reject(`Error loading script: ${paths[lib]}`);\n",
       "        document.getElementsByTagName(\"head\")[0].appendChild(s);\n",
       "      });\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    function showError(err) {\n",
       "      outputDiv.innerHTML = `<div class=\"error\" style=\"color:red;\">${err}</div>`;\n",
       "      throw err;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    function displayChart(vegaEmbed) {\n",
       "      vegaEmbed(outputDiv, spec, embedOpt)\n",
       "        .catch(err => showError(`Javascript Error: ${err.message}<br>This usually means there's a typo in your chart specification. See the javascript console for the full traceback.`));\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    if(typeof define === \"function\" && define.amd) {\n",
       "      requirejs.config({paths});\n",
       "      require([\"vega-embed\"], displayChart, err => showError(`Error loading script: ${err.message}`));\n",
       "    } else if (typeof vegaEmbed === \"function\") {\n",
       "      displayChart(vegaEmbed);\n",
       "    } else {\n",
       "      loadScript(\"vega\")\n",
       "        .then(() => loadScript(\"vega-lite\"))\n",
       "        .then(() => loadScript(\"vega-embed\"))\n",
       "        .catch(showError)\n",
       "        .then(() => displayChart(vegaEmbed));\n",
       "    }\n",
       "  })({\"config\": {\"view\": {\"continuousWidth\": 400, \"continuousHeight\": 300}}, \"data\": {\"name\": \"data-63aecf2f05f37e89adba3d19b99236e4\"}, \"mark\": {\"type\": \"line\", \"point\": true}, \"encoding\": {\"x\": {\"type\": \"quantitative\", \"field\": \"k\"}, \"y\": {\"type\": \"quantitative\", \"field\": \"inertia\"}}, \"title\": \"Elbow Curve\", \"$schema\": \"https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v4.8.1.json\", \"datasets\": {\"data-63aecf2f05f37e89adba3d19b99236e4\": [{\"k\": 1, \"inertia\": 725.9517248378518}, {\"k\": 2, \"inertia\": 492.96693680588487}, {\"k\": 3, \"inertia\": 275.30288419312035}, {\"k\": 4, \"inertia\": 106.47604571857067}, {\"k\": 5, \"inertia\": 72.71014655681381}, {\"k\": 6, \"inertia\": 49.885083551978056}, {\"k\": 7, \"inertia\": 30.35740968622662}, {\"k\": 8, \"inertia\": 21.82119642912079}, {\"k\": 9, \"inertia\": 14.066289039880491}, {\"k\": 10, \"inertia\": 10.372077497687949}]}}, {\"mode\": \"vega-lite\"});\n",
       "</script>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "alt.Chart(...)"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 121,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "inertia = []\n",
    "k = list(range(1, 11))\n",
    "\n",
    "# Calculate the inertia for the range of k values\n",
    "for i in k:\n",
    "    km = KMeans(n_clusters=i, random_state=0)\n",
    "    km.fit(pcs_df)\n",
    "    inertia.append(km.inertia_)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create the Elbow Curve using altair.\n",
    "elbow_data = {\"k\": k, \"inertia\": inertia}\n",
    "df_elbow = pd.DataFrame(elbow_data)\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "alt.Chart(df_elbow).mark_line(point=True).encode(\n",
    "    x= \"k\",\n",
    "    y= \"inertia\",\n",
    "  \n",
    "    \n",
    ").properties(\n",
    "    title=\"Elbow Curve\"\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Running K-Means with `k=<4>`"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 122,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [

       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "     Algorithm IsTrading ProofType TotalCoinsMined TotalCoinSupply  \\\n",
       "NVC     Scrypt      True   PoW/PoS     3.07931e+06              -1   \n",
       "XCP    SHA-256      True       PoW     2.61522e+06              -1   \n",
       "NSR        PoS      True       PoS     5.84967e+09               0   \n",
       "MONA    Scrypt      True       PoW     8.00016e+07              -1   \n",
       "TRI        X13      True   PoW/PoS          166244               0   \n",
       "\n",
       "      principal component 1  principal component 2  principal component 3  \\\n",
       "NVC               -0.717187               0.921906              -1.854723   \n",
       "XCP                0.190002              -1.707377               0.086342   \n",
       "NSR               -0.475162               1.271748               1.116314   \n",
       "MONA              -0.352482              -1.002651              -0.493263   \n",
       "TRI               -0.798090               1.670343              -2.454904   \n",
       "\n",
       "      Class        CoinName  \n",
       "NVC       3        NovaCoin  \n",
       "XCP       1    CounterParty  \n",
       "NSR       0        NuShares  \n",
       "MONA      1        MonaCoin  \n",
       "TRI       3  Triangles Coin  "
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 122,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# Initialize the K-Means model\n",
    "model = KMeans(n_clusters=4, random_state=0)\n",
    "# Fit the model\n",
    "model.fit(pcs_df)\n",
    "# Predict clusters\n",
    "\n",
    "predictions = model.predict(pcs_df)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create a new DataFrame including predicted clusters and cryptocurrencies features\n",
    "pcs_df[\"Class\"] = model.labels_\n",
    "clustered_df = pd.concat([df2,pcs_df,y], join=\"outer\", axis=1)\n",
    "clustered_df.head()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Visualizing Results\n",
    "\n",
    "#### 3D-Scatter with Clusters"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",

       "\n",
       "<div id=\"altair-viz-12a8e795973b4ffc801cf1104cced19b\"></div>\n",
       "<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n",
       "  (function(spec, embedOpt){\n",
       "    let outputDiv = document.currentScript.previousElementSibling;\n",
       "    if (outputDiv.id !== \"altair-viz-12a8e795973b4ffc801cf1104cced19b\") {\n",
       "      outputDiv = document.getElementById(\"altair-viz-12a8e795973b4ffc801cf1104cced19b\");\n",
       "    }\n",
       "    const paths = {\n",
       "      \"vega\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega@5?noext\",\n",
       "      \"vega-lib\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-lib?noext\",\n",
       "      \"vega-lite\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-lite@4.8.1?noext\",\n",
       "      \"vega-embed\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-embed@6?noext\",\n",
       "    };\n",
       "\n",
       "    function loadScript(lib) {\n",
       "      return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {\n",
       "        var s = document.createElement('script');\n",
       "        s.src = paths[lib];\n",
       "        s.async = true;\n",
       "        s.onload = () => resolve(paths[lib]);\n",
       "        s.onerror = () => reject(`Error loading script: ${paths[lib]}`);\n",
       "        document.getElementsByTagName(\"head\")[0].appendChild(s);\n",
       "      });\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    function showError(err) {\n",
       "      outputDiv.innerHTML = `<div class=\"error\" style=\"color:red;\">${err}</div>`;\n",
       "      throw err;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    function displayChart(vegaEmbed) {\n",
       "      vegaEmbed(outputDiv, spec, embedOpt)\n",
       "        .catch(err => showError(`Javascript Error: ${err.message}<br>This usually means there's a typo in your chart specification. See the javascript console for the full traceback.`));\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    if(typeof define === \"function\" && define.amd) {\n",
       "      requirejs.config({paths});\n",

       "    } else if (typeof vegaEmbed === \"function\") {\n",

       "    } else {\n",

       "        .then(() => loadScript(\"vega-embed\"))\n",

   ],
   "source": [
    "# Create a 2D-Scatter with the PCA data and the clusters\n",
    "alt.Chart(clustered_df).mark_circle(size=60).encode(\n",
    "    x='principal component 1',\n",
    "    y='principal component 2',\n",
    "    color='CoinName',\n",
    "    tooltip=['CoinName', 'Algorithm', 'TotalCoinsMined', 'TotalCoinSupply']\n",
    ").properties(\n",
    "    width=600\n",
    ").interactive()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},

       "...      ...  \n",
       "ETH        1  \n",
       "WAVES      0  \n",
       "ADA        0  \n",
       "EOS        0  \n",
       "WBBC       2  \n",
       "\n",
       "[99 rows x 6 columns]"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "<DisplayHandle display_id=Tradable Cryptos>"

     "execution_count": 124,

    "# Table with tradable cryptos\n",

    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# Scale data to create the scatter plot\n",
    "c_scaler = MinMaxScaler()\n",
    "\n",
    "clustered_scaled = c_scaler.fit_transform(\n",
    "    clustered_df[[\"TotalCoinsMined\", \"TotalCoinSupply\"]]\n",
    ")\n",
    "clustered_scaled = pd.DataFrame(clustered_scaled, columns=[\"TotalCoinsMined\", \"TotalCoinSupply\"], index=clustered_df.index)\n",
    "clustered_scaled[\"CoinName\"]=clustered_df[\"CoinName\"]\n",
    "clustered_scaled[\"Class\"]=clustered_df[\"Class\"]\n",
    "clustered_scaled"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 128,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "\n",
       "<div id=\"altair-viz-5f617861f9b5436f8aaf144449c1db76\"></div>\n",
       "<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n",
       "  (function(spec, embedOpt){\n",
       "    let outputDiv = document.currentScript.previousElementSibling;\n",
       "    if (outputDiv.id !== \"altair-viz-5f617861f9b5436f8aaf144449c1db76\") {\n",
       "      outputDiv = document.getElementById(\"altair-viz-5f617861f9b5436f8aaf144449c1db76\");\n",
       "    }\n",
       "    const paths = {\n",
       "      \"vega\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega@5?noext\",\n",
       "      \"vega-lib\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-lib?noext\",\n",
       "      \"vega-lite\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-lite@4.8.1?noext\",\n",
       "      \"vega-embed\": \"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm//vega-embed@6?noext\",\n",
       "    };\n",
       "\n",
       "    function loadScript(lib) {\n",
       "      return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {\n",
       "        var s = document.createElement('script');\n",
       "        s.src = paths[lib];\n",
       "        s.async = true;\n",
       "        s.onload = () => resolve(paths[lib]);\n",
       "        s.onerror = () => reject(`Error loading script: ${paths[lib]}`);\n",
       "        document.getElementsByTagName(\"head\")[0].appendChild(s);\n",
       "      });\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    function showError(err) {\n",
       "      outputDiv.innerHTML = `<div class=\"error\" style=\"color:red;\">${err}</div>`;\n",
       "      throw err;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    function displayChart(vegaEmbed) {\n",
       "      vegaEmbed(outputDiv, spec, embedOpt)\n",
       "        .catch(err => showError(`Javascript Error: ${err.message}<br>This usually means there's a typo in your chart specification. See the javascript console for the full traceback.`));\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    if(typeof define === \"function\" && define.amd) {\n",
       "      requirejs.config({paths});\n",
       "      require([\"vega-embed\"], displayChart, err => showError(`Error loading script: ${err.message}`));\n",
       "    } else if (typeof vegaEmbed === \"function\") {\n",
       "      displayChart(vegaEmbed);\n",
       "    } else {\n",
       "      loadScript(\"vega\")\n",
       "        .then(() => loadScript(\"vega-lite\"))\n",
       "        .then(() => loadScript(\"vega-embed\"))\n",
       "        .catch(showError)\n",
       "        .then(() => displayChart(vegaEmbed));\n",
       "    }\n",

   ],
   "source": [
    "# Plot the scatter with x=\"TotalCoinsMined\" and y=\"TotalCoinSupply\"\n",
    "alt.Chart(clustered_scaled).mark_circle().encode(\n",
    "    x=\"TotalCoinsMined\",\n",
    "    y=\"TotalCoinSupply\",\n",
    "    color=\"CoinName\"\n",
    "    \n",
    ")\n"
